title: Hour 1 - When Training  Camp Goes Wrong
itunes:title: Hour 1 - When Training  Camp Goes Wrong
description:
Dan Patrick reacts to the wild video of Aaron Donald's fight at a Rams scrimmage with the Bengals. Dan explains why he still isn't seeing everything he wants to see from Trey Lance. Former NFL OL Ross Tucker joins Dan to give insight on what it is like to be cut from a team during training camp. Plus, could baseball see a feat that hasn't been done in over 80 years?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
